DataListSpec.Name: Website Child Search Partner Reserved Children Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Display the children that are reserved for a particular partner.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_WEBSITE_CHILDSEARCH_PARTNER_RESERVEDCHILDREN ( @PARTNERLOOKUPID nvarchar(100), @GENDER nvarchar(25) = null, @AGEMIN nvarchar(10) = null, @AGEMAX nvarchar(10) = null, @COUNTRY nvarchar(25) = null ) as begin declare @ReservedChildren as table ( ID uniqueidentifier, FIRSTNAME nvarchar(255), LASTNAME nvarchar(255), FULLNAME nvarchar(255), COUNTRYNAME nvarchar(255), COUNTRYID uniqueidentifier, AGE tinyint, BIRTHDATE nvarchar(255), GENDER nvarchar(255), GENDERCODE tinyint, PROJECTNAME nvarchar(255), PROJECTID uniqueidentifier, CHILDNO nvarchar(255), ELIGIBILITY nvarchar(255), AVAILABILITY nvarchar(255) ) insert @ReservedChildren exec dbo.USR_USP_WEBSITE_GETAVAILABLECHILDRENFORPARTNER @PARTNERLOOKUPID
select rc.ID, rc.PROJECTID, rc.COUNTRYID, rc.COUNTRYNAME, project.LOOKUPID, rc.PROJECTNAME, rc.CHILDNO, rc.FIRSTNAME, rc.LASTNAME, rc.FULLNAME, rc.AGE, rc.BIRTHDATE, rc.GENDER, rc.GENDERCODE, rc.ELIGIBILITY, rc.AVAILABILITY from @ReservedChildren rc inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT project on project.ID = rc.PROJECTID where ((@GENDER is null or @GENDER = '') or (rc.GENDER = @GENDER)) and ((@COUNTRY is null or @COUNTRY = '') or (upper(COUNTRYNAME) = upper(@COUNTRY))) and ((@AGEMIN is null or @AGEMIN ='') or (@AGEMIN is not null and @AGEMIN <> '' and rc.AGE >= cast (@AGEMIN as int))) and ((@AGEMAX is null or @AGEMAX ='') or (@AGEMAX is not null and @AGEMAX <> '' and rc.AGE <= cast (@AGEMAX as int)))
end
